text_simple: and i know that this world ended in great pain

name: earth_arcana_special_05_02
text: I know... there are lines that must not be crossed, and someone has crossed them.
text_simple: i know there are lines that must not be crossed and someone has crossed them

name: earth_arcana_special_06_02
text: I cannot undo what has been done. I cannot save those who were lost. But I will learn how to cross such great distances, and avenge the wrongs done my sister earth.
text_simple: i cannot undo what has been done i cannot save those who were lost but i will learn how to cross such great distances and avenge the wrongs done my sister earth

name: earth_arcana_special_08_01
text: I am changing. No, I am changed. With what more to come?
text_simple: i am changing no i am changed with what more to come

name: earth_arcana_special_09_01
text: I felt...something in the first days. Even before the visions arrived.
text_simple: i felt something in the first days even before the visions arrived

name: earth_arcana_special_10_01
text: But the onset of the dreams--or should I say memories--drove that other strange feeling from my mind.
text_simple: but the onset of the dreamsor should i say memoriesdrove that other strange feeling from my mind

name: earth_arcana_special_11_02
text: Now there are changes too striking to ignore.
text_simple: now there are changes too striking to ignore

name: earth_arcana_special_12_03
text: And I can only wonder...What will my sister earth make of me?
text_simple: and i can only wonder what will my sister earth make of me

name: earth_arcana_special_13_01
text: Something is coming. I cannot name it, but I know it holds hostility in its heart.
text_simple: something is coming i cannot name it but i know it holds hostility in its heart

name: earth_arcana_special_14_02
text: I know I have met this entity before. In another life.
text_simple: i know i have met this entity before in another life

name: earth_arcana_special_15_02
text: I did not live to tell the tale.
text_simple: i did not live to tell the tale

name: earth_arcana_special_16_01
text: But I did pass something on. For here I stand.
text_simple: but i did pass something on for here i stand

name: earth_arcana_special_17
text: This time I shall not falter. I will not fall.
text_simple: this time i shall not falter i will not fall

name: earth_arcana_special_18_02
text: I still live. The strange memories I carry still remain.
text_simple: i still live the strange memories i carry still remain

name: earth_arcana_special_19_02
text: The traveler--trespasser--will never leave this earth. But he is not unique.
text_simple: the travelertrespasserwill never leave this earth but he is not unique

name: earth_arcana_special_20_02
text: There are others of his kind who share blame for the death of my sister earth...and perhaps countless other worlds bereft of champions.
text_simple: there are others of his kind who share blame for the death of my sister earth and perhaps countless other worlds bereft of champions

name: earth_arcana_special_21_02
text: For all my abilities, I have much to learn. When these wounds have healed or...grown over, I must find a greater power, and venture away from my beloved soil.
text_simple: for all my abilities i have much to learn when these wounds have healed or grown over i must find a greater power and venture away from my beloved soil

name: earth_arcana_special_22_01
text: The cosmic dreams reveal aspects of the path, but the rest is up to me.
text_simple: the cosmic dreams reveal aspects of the path but the rest is up to me

name: earth_arcana_special_23_03
text: I will not rest. The fates of many worlds rest in these hands.
text_simple: i will not rest the fates of many worlds rest in these hands

name: earth_arcana_thanks_05
text: I'll take what I can get.
text_simple: ill take what i can get

name: earth_arcana_win_07_02
text: How did we pull that off?
text_simple: how did we pull that off

name: earth_arcana_win_09_02
text: That's how you shake things up.
text_simple: thats how you shake things up
